actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Stella Marie Deignan.

summary.text: Directs the Chairman of the Civil Service Commission to determine the amount of benefits under the Federal Employees' Compensation Fund to which a certain individual would have been entitled had such individual's husband died on a certain day after electing widow's survivor benefits. Authorizes the Chairman to pay to such individual such sum.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Stella Marie Deignan.
